Drawing

Class TextBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • Drawing.ClickBox
      • Drawing.TextBox
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TextEditBox

    public class TextBox
extends ClickBox
    the textbox class is used to render all the texts used in the menu's and all the other differnt states and gives us the opportunity for instance to change the alignment of each text.
